Modules

Here is a list of all modules:
  • Avr Hardware Drivers
    • zoAdc.h : Avr ADC peripheral function library.
    • zoI2c.h : I2C function library.
    • zoSystemTimer.h : Watchdog and timing functionality.
    • zoUart.h : Avr uart0 function library.
  • Software utilities
    • zoBuffer.h : Byte ring buffers.
    • zoError.h : Byte ring buffers used for error storage.
    • zoMcu.h : Global-interrupt-enable-bit manipulation macros
    • zoString.h : Conversion of strings to integers and vice versa.
    • zoTypes.h : Types commonly used in zoAvrLib
  • Drivers for external ICs
